metadata.title: CVE-2017-8294 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: libyara/re.c in the regex component in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via a crafted rule that is mishandled in the yr_re_exec function.

criterions.comment: yara package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.1-1ubuntu2').
